entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 9.0 .NET SDK shipping binaries from previous servicing bands #44370
  • When i use "dotnet publish" to generate osx-arm64 binary file on my win-x64 pc. I get an incorrect format file. #44359

Closed

  • dotnet command fails after installing .NET SDK 8.0.403 on Mariner 2.0 #44372
  • Create a `solution` alias for the existing `sln` command #40817
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] DiscordChatExporter build with warning：‘ServicePointManager' is obsolete: 'WebRequest, HttpWebRequest, ServicePoint, and WebClient are obsolete. #43621
  • [NETSDKE2E]After installing NET 9 RTM SDK and downloading wasm-tools, uninstalling the SDK does not completely clear the contents under the dotnet directory. #44052

PullRequests

Created

  • Address MD linter issues in VMR README.md #44376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #44375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the shipped RC2 build #44364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #44371
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use non-stable SDK version for SB artifacts #44362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #43626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make the Details command faster to create and drag in fewer DLLs #44366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update net-sdk-supporting-feed #44363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2566554 #44365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore cleanWhileBuilding errors #44361
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Maestro feed automation from NuGet.config in main #44357
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Continue printing out redirected process output after we detect browser launch URL. #44290
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Always print manifest versions in workload list command #44339
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire
  • [Draft] Adding --format support to `dotnet new list` #44140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    DO NOT MERGE, 10.0.1xx
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Dotnet test integration #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
